name: pplacer
description:
Pplacer places query sequences on a fixed reference phylogenetic tree to
maximize phylogenetic likelihood or posterior probability according to a
reference alignment. Pplacer is designed to be fast, to give useful
information about uncertainty, and to offer advanced visualization and
downstream analysis.

dependent_to.name: py-checkm-genome
dependent_to.description:
Assess the quality of microbial genomes recovered from isolates, single
cells, and metagenomes

dependent_to.name: py-gtdbtk
dependent_to.description:
GTDB-Tk is a software toolkit for assigning objective taxonomic
classifications to bacterial and archaeal genomes based on the Genome
Database Taxonomy (GTDB).
